description: The initiative is a community-driven agroecological project focused on environmental education and sustainable living. Founded in 1998, it has evolved to include volunteer programs, workshops, and retreats that promote self-sufficiency and social responsibility. The project emphasizes the importance of fostering connections between people and nature, while also addressing challenges related to governance, economic sustainability, and community engagement. Its future plans include developing an eco-village to enhance its impact and outreach.
name: Finca Agroecologica La Flor
